mapper.select: SELECT M.NO , M.NAME , M.TEL , D.NAME AS departmentName , P.NAME AS positionName , M.EMAIL , M.TEL FROM MEMBER M JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON M.DEPART_NO = D.NO JOIN POSITION P ON M.POSITION_NO = P.NO WHERE M.COMPANY_NO = #{companyNo} AND M.DEPART_NO = #{departNo} ORDER BY M.POSITION_NO DESC
SELECT ORG_NO , MEMBER_NO , PROFILE , DEPARTMENT , POSITION , NAME , TEL FROM ORGAN WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
